comment: I don't hate Jews, Africans, Europeans, Indians, Mexicans, Asians, or any race. I hate Communists, Socialists, Fascists, Imperialists, Feudalists, Tribalists, Welfare freeloaders, human sponges, and locusts. A Godly society only needs a few things: Freedom (Freedom of Association, Freedom of Religion), right to keep/bear arms, &Capitalism
amr:
# ::snt I don't hate Jews, Africans, Europeans, Indians, Mexicans, Asians, or any race. I hate Communists, Socialists, Fascists, Imperialists, Feudalists, Tribalists, Welfare freeloaders, human sponges, and locusts. A Godly society only needs a few things: Freedom (Freedom of Association, Freedom of Religion), right to keep/bear arms, &Capitalism
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (h / hate-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG1 (o / or
                  :op1 (p / person
                        :mod (r / religious-group
                              :name (n / name
                                    :op1 "Jew")))
                  :op2 (p2 / person
                        :mod (c / continent
                              :name (n2 / name
                                    :op1 "Africa")))
                  :op3 (p3 / person
                        :mod c
                        :name (n3 / name
                              :op1 "Europe")))
            :op4 (p4 / person
                  :mod (c2 / country
                        :name (n4 / name
                              :op1 "India")))
            :op5 (p5 / person
                  :mod (c3 / country
                        :name (n5 / name
                              :op1 "Mexico")))
            :op6 (p6 / person
                  :mod c
                  :name (n6 / name
                        :op1 "Asia")))
      :op7 (r2 / race
            :mod (a / any))
      :snt2 (h2 / hate-01
            :ARG0 (ii2 / i)
            :ARG1 (a2 / and
                  :op1 (p7 / person
                        :mod (p8 / political-movement
                              :name (n7 / name
                                    :op1 "Communist")))
                  :op2 (p9 / person
                        :mod (p10 / political-movement
                              :name (n8 / name
                                    :op1 "Socialism")))
                  :op3 (p11 / person
                        :mod (p12 / political-movement
                              :name (n9 / name
                                    :op1 "Fascism")))
                  :op4 (p13 / person
                        :mod (ii3 / imperialism))
                  :op5 (p14 / person
                        :mod (f / Feudalist))
                  :op6 (p15 / person
                        :mod (t / tribe))
                  :op7 (f2 / freeloader
                        :mod (w / welfare))
                  :op8 (l / locust)))
      :snt3 (n10 / need-01
            :ARG0 (s / society
                  :mod (g / godly))
            :ARG1 (t2 / thing
                  :quant (f3 / few)
                  :example (a3 / and
                        :op1 (f4 / free-04
                              :ARG3 (a4 / association))
                        :op2 (f5 / free-04
                              :ARG3 (r3 / religion)))
                  :op3 (r4 / right-05
                        :ARG2 (s2 / slash
                              :op1 (k / keep-01
                                    :ARG1 (a5 / arm))
                              :op2 (b / bear-01
                                    :ARG1 a5)))
                  :op4 a5))
      :mod (o2 / only))

comment: -z-jews - Is goody virtue-signalling?- or just picking words out of a hat?- or maybe reducing a book report for his th-grade teacher down to characters or less.
amr:
# ::snt -z-jews - Is goody virtue-signalling?- or just picking words out of a hat?- or maybe reducing a book report for his th-grade teacher down to characters or less.
(a / ask-01
      :ARG1 (o / or
            :op1 (s / sign-01
                  :ARG1 (v / virtue)
                  :ARG1-of (g / good-02)
                  :polarity (a2 / amr-unknown))
            :op2 (p / pick-01
                  :ARG1 (w / word)
                  :ARG2 (h / hat)
                  :mod (j / just)
                  :polarity (a3 / amr-unknown))
            :op3 (r / reduce-01
                  :ARG1 (r2 / report-01
                        :ARG1 (b / book)
                        :ARG2 (p2 / person
                              :ARG0-of (t / teach-01
                                    :ARG2 (h2 / he))
                              :mod (g2 / grade
                                    :ord (o2 / ordinal-entity
                                          :value o2
                                          :value (v2 / value-interval
                                                :op1 2))))))
            :ARG4 (o3 / or
                  :op1 (c / character)
                  :op2 (l / less))
            :ARG1-of (p3 / possible-01))
      :ARG2 p2
      :name (n / name
            :op1 "z-jews"))

# ::snt keith goody is a cuck.
(c / cuck
      :domain (p / person
            :name (n / name
                  :op1 "keith"
                  :op2 "goody")))

comment: Hey there, homophobic slurs are offensive and hurtful and should not be used. Please refrain from these types of comments. Thank you
amr:
# ::snt Hey there, homophobic slurs are offensive and hurtful and should not be used. Please refrain from these types of comments. Thank you
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (a / and
            :op1 (o / offend-01
                  :ARG0 (s / slur
                        :mod (h / homophobia)))
            :op2 (h2 / hurt-01
                  :ARG0 s)
            :op3 (r / recommend-01
                  :ARG1 (u / use-01
                        :polarity -
                        :ARG1 s))
            :mod (h3 / hey
                  :mode expressive)
            :location (t / there))
      :snt2 (r2 / refrain-01
            :mode imperative
            :polite +
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (c / comment-01
                  :mod (t2 / type
                        :mod (t3 / this))))
      :snt3 (t4 / thank-01
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG1 (y2 / you)))
